int GetMenuTextSize (const char *str, SIZE &size)

Detailed Description

CXrayM Dialog. The windows menu got replaced becase of some ugly inconsistancies.
Ex: Popup did not inherit color scheme, dialog lifetime did not allow retrieval after menu disappeared, leaky resource management ...
This replacement menu is eazy ... just call LoadAndShow(Resoure, skip, pointX, pointY) to work it.

This menu obey/load correct menu font and assume the XrayNotes theme correctly. This file is open sourced during development.
